Preterit.turoyo: Mraǧaʕlan lu qonsolos d Almanya d obeli wiza. (İlyas p.c)
Mraǧaʕli li dawle doboli mʕawana. (İlyas p.c) Mraǧaʕlan, huwwe daṣṭə̀r diḏan, edi aṯina.
translations: ‘We applied, they gave us permission, then we came.’ (Nisane 2018

Infectum.turoyo: Kǝmraǧʕina aḥna kul šato li dawle d obo mʕawana li zraʕa.(İlyas p.c)
Kǝmraǧʕina reǧoʕo li dawle kul šato lašan d nofaq mʕawana lu ʕamo. (İlyas p.c)
